coredb.compass.converter
Class EntityInstanceResourceConverter

java.lang.Object
  coredb.compass.converter.EntityInstanceResourceConverter

public class EntityInstanceResourceConverter
extends java.lang.Object

This class allows conversion from EntityInstance to compass Resource object.

Author:
sean

convertEntityToResource

public static org.compass.core.Resource convertEntityToResource(org.compass.core.Compass compass,
                                                                coredb.unit.EntityInstance entity)
Convert EntityInstance to compass Resource

Parameters:
compass - the current working compass
entity - the EntityInstance need to convert to compass Resource
Returns:
returns the compass Resource converted from the given EntityInstance

convertEntityToResource

public static org.compass.core.Resource convertEntityToResource(org.compass.core.Compass compass,
                                                                coredb.unit.EntityInstance entity,
                                                                java.util.List<java.lang.String> indexOnColumns)
Convert EntityInstance to compass Resource

Parameters:
compass - the current working compass
entity - the EntityInstance need to convert to compass Resource
indexOnColumns - the list of Columns of the given EntityInstance need to convert
Returns:
returns the compass Resource converted from the given EntityInstance based on the list of columns
